title: @Riot, Change ban mechanic !!
body:
Something like...

X team vs Y team
X = X1 X2 X3 X4 X5
Y = Y1 Y2 Y3 Y4 Y5

Y1 Y2 Ban
X1 Ban
X1 Pick
Y1 Y2 Pick
X2 X3 Ban
Y3 Y4 Ban
X2 X3 Pick
Y3 Y4 Pick
X4 X5 Ban
Y5 Ban
X4 X5 Pick
Y5 Pick

**The order may change, but the main idea is everyone has 1 P/B chance and all ban chances aren't thrown in the beginning of P/B phase**

why?

1. Because increasing the number of bans have been talked lately
2. P/B phase in competitive plays is boring!! how many times I said "oh it's ali again, zil again, thresh again, lee again, lucian again" when watching s4 world?
3. it will reduce the blame thing in Ban phase. Well "gg not ban cait when pick graves" or alike will be inevitable, but at least it's better than "gg not ban [insert FotM champ here]"
4. diversity !!
5. Why the hell the ban given to the captain? If I want to learn how to trust my team captain, I'll play doto instead, my captain can even pick me a hero.
6. The P/B phase will be more interactive
7. And many others that I can't remember.


thoughts?

replies.body: This is too complicated for riot, they would never do it.

It isn't really all that complicated for the player though
first time it is your turn... ban... second time... pick that's it
Smite does this easily. It works wonders for team comps.

I still want this to be implemented, the ban phase is just merely "ban FoTM" phase atm. If we throw ban phase between picks, we will see more meaningful decision / intellectual ban.

I definitely support this idea or something like it.  Riot's stated reason for not increasing the number of bans is that it would be too easy to ban out a particular summoner's mains.  By alternating picks and bans, you can't be sure of banning someone out entirely because they get a chance to pick before all of the bans come through.  It also gives the ability to ban reactively based on the enemy teamcomp so far instead of just "ban Lee Sin he's OP and they pick first."
